text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia albida is a plant species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is endemic to Mexico.
text.Description: The Tillandsia albida is a light green/white air plant which tolerates dry conditions. Its flowers are a light cream color . It enjoys bright light and warm weather. It is endemic to Mexico.
text.References:
Checklist of Mexican Bromeliaceae with Notes on Species Distribution and Levels of Endemism retrieved 3 November 2009
